ShopKaro.short: üõí MERN e-commerce app with Razorpay payments
ShopKaro.desc: ShopKaro is a full-stack e-commerce platform built with the MERN stack. It allows users to browse products, manage carts, make secure payments using Razorpay, and track their orders. It includes authentication, role-based admin panel, and responsive UI.

EasyDine.desc: EasyDine is a food ordering and restaurant table booking application. It provides real-time seat booking, food ordering, and payment gateway integration for a smooth dining experience.

Portfolio.desc: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and achievements. Built with MERN stack and includes an admin panel for managing content.
points: Dynamic content management with admin panel

services.name: E-commerce Development
services.shortDescription: Online stores with secure payments & modern UI
services.longDescription: Build scalable and feature-rich e-commerce platforms with seamless checkout, secure payments, and user-friendly interfaces. From product catalogs to cart management and order tracking, I create optimized solutions with Razorpay/Stripe integration and advanced analytics for sales tracking.

services.name: Backend & API Development
services.longDescription: Build fast and secure REST & GraphQL APIs to power applications with real-time data handling. My APIs ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend with authentication, role-based access, and database optimization for high performance.

services.name: AI-Powered Chatbots
services.longDescription: AI-driven chatbots enhance customer engagement and automate responses. Using NLP and machine learning, my chatbots handle FAQs, customer queries, and even support ticketing. They integrate seamlessly into websites and messaging apps, offering 24/7 support while reducing operational costs.

services.name: Full-Stack Web Development
services.shortDescription: Custom websites & web apps for businesses
services.longDescription: I develop dynamic and scalable web applications with modern UI/UX, responsive design, and backend integration. Using the MERN stack, I ensure high performance, security, and seamless user experience. Whether it‚Äôs a business site, portfolio, or complex web app, I deliver tailored solutions that meet industry standards.
services.technology: MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node), Bootstrap

services.name: Static Website Development
services.shortDescription: Fast, lightweight, and SEO-friendly static websites
services.longDescription: I create beautifully designed, fast-loading, and SEO-optimized static websites. These sites are perfect for portfolios, business landing pages, and informational websites. With a focus on responsiveness and performance, I ensure your website delivers an excellent user experience across all devices. No database required, making it ultra-secure and low-maintenance.
services.technology: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS
